sect2.title: Installation of Screen
sect2.para: Install Screen by running the following commands:
This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: --with-socket-dir=/var/run/screen: This option places the per-user sockets in a standard location.
--with-sys-screenrc=/etc/screenrc: This option places the global screenrc file in /etc.
--with-pty-group=4 : This option sets the gid to the value used by LFS.

note.para: Newer versions of LFS use the value 5 for the tty group. If you are using the development version of LFS, change the pty-group option to 5.

sect2.para: sed -i -e "s%/usr/local/etc/screenrc%/etc/screenrc%" {etc,doc}/*: This command corrects the configuration and documentation files to the location that is used here for the global screenrc file.

sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: You may want to look at the example configuration file that was installed and customize it for your needs.
